readable.title: 3609027309_af75f773d9
readable.content: A little boy and a woman dancing . A man in a dance studio holds the hand of a boy , teaching him to dance . Group of people teach a little boy in a red shirt and sneakers how to dance . The little boy in the red shirt is dancing with the lady in the brown shirt and blue jeans while two people look on . Two adults dancing with a little boy while another person standing in the background .
